title: Shapoorji Pallonji taps Deutsche Bank, DAM Capital to raise Rs 3,000 crore from private credit funds
description: Shapoorji Pallonji Group aims to raise Rs 3,000 crore via Deutsche Bank and DAM Capital to refinance debt from Ares SSG Capital and Farallon, reducing 18-22% rates. Supported by a Rs 15,000 crore Power Finance Corporation loan and Gopalpur port sale to Adani Group, the group plans a Rs 7,000 crore Afcons Infrastructure IPO, exploring global funds.
